name: Cars vs TNT
description:
Drive with A/D. Speed up and slow down with W/S. Don't explode, and make it to the finish quickly! This game was made in 1 hour 45 minutes. Oh, and enjoy! Your high score will be saved to the local device.

Please note that when you go faster, the collision detection looks more inaccurate. It is actually perfectly accurate, it just looks inaccurate.

Credits:

Code--Future games

Graphics--Future games

Music--Future games

Sound effects--ZapSplat.com
